targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "req_rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rate")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main" or r["proxy"] == "vault")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "FRONTEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "scur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "FRONTEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "vault")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "BACKEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ctime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "vault")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "BACKEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "qtime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "vault")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "BACKEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "http_response.4xx" or r["_field"] == "http_response.5xx")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "FRONTEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ereq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "main")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "FRONTEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_idle")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "metric_type", "cpu"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value * -1.0 + 100.0}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "metric_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["path"] == "/")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "metric_type", "path", "mode", "fstype", "device"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: For the backend this reports the number queued without a server assigned.

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "qcur")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["proxy"] == "vault")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["role"] == "haproxy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["sv"] == "BACKEND")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "server", "proxy", "type", "sv"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

panels.title: Current queued requests

result.text: Cluster works with less than 3 nodes

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.autopilot.failure_tolerance")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["datacenter", "metric_type", "role"])
  |> drop(columns: ["host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.autopilot.node.healthy")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "metric_type", "role", "host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.core.unsealed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "metric_type", "role"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.core.active")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "metric_type", "role"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.token.creation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "host", "auth_method", "creation_ttl", "mount_point", "namespace", "token_type", "metric_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.expire.num_leases")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "host", "namespace", "metric_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.raft.apply")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "host", "namespace", "metric_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.core.in_flight_requests")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "host", "metric_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Number of requests currently in progress

targets.query:
from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.core.handle_login_request" or r["_measurement"] == "vault.core.handle_request")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "us-east-1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "host", "metric_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vault_infra")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vault.token.create")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "test_cluster")
  |> drop(columns: ["cluster", "datacenter", "role", "host", "metric_type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
